main.name: Darwin Stephanus
main.description: currently looking forward to a new opportunity in the web development world
main.bio: I have always loved to dig into problems and solve them with modern technology. Software engineering is a never-ending puzzle that I am passionately engaged in solving. I had the chance to work as a Software Engineer Intern in one of the most exciting startup company in Indonesia and was exposed to the world of web development. Since then, I have developed into a more mature web developer and I was able to learn incredible technologies other developers have created to make web application more amazing and exciting
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Approximate percentage of web-technologies I am familiar with

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Classes I had taken previously including Database Systems, Data Structure & Algorithms, Artificial Intelligence, Cybersecurity Risk, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, Computer and Network Security, and Software Reverse Engineering. Along with that, I got a minor in cybersecurity.

work.title: Full-Stack Java Developer
work.description: • Involved in development and testing of web application and integration projects using Object Oriented technologies such as Core Java, JEE, JDBC, Spring 4 Framework (MVC, Security, AOP, DAO), Hibernate, JSON, Apache Tomcat, and Maven.
work.description2: • Used Angular 9 as a platform to build applications with the web which combines declarative templates, dependency injection, end to end tooling, and integrated best practices to solve development challenges.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: • Designed and implemented backend API using REST API and Spring Boot Framework by following MVC architecture.
work.description2: • Successfully implemented new feature on SaaS application already running in AWS using React Redux.
work.description3: • Controlled development, staging, and production using GitHub and AWS (Beanstalk, EC2, S3 and CloudFront).

projects.title: Visipaz
projects.category: Web Application connected to Raspberry Pi for meeting rooms built on Spring Boot and React

testimonials.text: Darwin proved himself to be a dependable, proactive person, and also a hard working in problem solving and technical skill. He does not only meet the deadline but also exceeded the expectation for an engineer intern. Overall, he is a very talented person, easy going, and hard working engineer.
testimonials.user: Wilson Sumanang - CEO of PT Inovasi Anak Indonesia
